actions.description: The steel predator makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) lightning damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) force damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: The steel predator emits a roar in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 33 (6d10) thunder damage, drops everything it's holding, and is stunned for 1 minute. The stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.
actions.name: Stunning Roar (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description:
The steel predator casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:
3/day each: dimension door (self only), plane shift (self only)
actions.name: Spellcasting

conditionImmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, stunned
damageImmunities: poison, psychic; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
languages: understands Modron and the language of its owner but can't speak
name: Steel Predator [MoM]

specialTraits.description: The steel predator has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance

specialTraits.description: The steel predator doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
specialTraits.name: Unusual Nature
